## GridTools.IMultiGridViewProps interface

Props for the MultiGridView component. Container for multiple grid instances with shared context and batch operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IMultiGridViewProps extends IViewBaseProps 
```
**Extends:** [IViewBaseProps](./ts-res-ui-components.viewstatetools.iviewbaseprops.md)
